thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: Nicholas Roche

author: Nicholas Roche
title: Nicholas Roche
text: Some time ago, my local comic shop went the way of the dodo (it didn't close, but they became an all-gaming store with no comics). I had fallen way behind on a lot of my favorite books when I found MyComicShop.com through eBay. Since then, most of the gaps in my collection have been filled through their services. I especially love the $4.95 flat shipping fee for orders big or small! Many thanks to them!
